channel.title: Changing wepon animations and adding new ones? plese help dudes
channel.description:
dude, i know i sound REALLY nooby, but i want to add animations for d mace, d hally,and some more weps, and also change some wepon animations, does ANYone knowhow?
i have the emotes i want, even if i dont ill jus play around till i find the one that looks best
if u need my source its pimpscape[br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2007, 07:45:16 PM[/size][hr]yeh i know double post, but please help me atleast point me in the right direction, i really wanted wepon animations for d hally, mace, and scim, i have the emote IDs, i jus dont know what to do :/ help me please
